title: Problems with upgrading skin shard to permanent
body: I own Ryze, have a skin shard with him, and have more than enough blue essence to unlock it yet it is still locked. Has happened to every skin chard ive owned.

replies.body: Ahhhhh I see the problem. You're trying to redeem a *champion shard* not a skin shard. That Ryze shard is a champion shard used to unlock the champion permanently, but you already own him so it won't let you own 2 copies of the same champion.
